cz.vutbr.fit.pdb.ateam.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.vutbr.fit.pdb.ateam.controller.Controller
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimalsTabController, EmployeesTabController, LoadingDialogController, LoginFormController, MainFrameController, SpatialObjectTabController, ZooMapController

    public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for managing all view events.

    Every frame or panel should have its own cz.vutbr.fit.pdb.ateam.cz.vutbr.fit.pdb.ateam.controller class, which extends this class. It's forbidden to instance this class from classes, which do not extend this class.

    Author:
    Jakub Tutko, Tomas Mlynaric, Tomas Hanus

    • Method Detail

      • reloadAllData

        public void reloadAllData()
        Reloads all data when application starts

      • saveModels

        public void saveModels(java.util.Collection<? extends BaseModel> models)
        Saves list of models to the database based on DataManager.saveModel(BaseModel) method. After saving, notifies listeners which listens for IModelChangedStateListener. Listeners are notified only when model is actualy saved! (if is changed)
        Parameters:
        models - list of models to saveModel

      • saveModels

        public void saveModels(BaseModel model)
        Save any changed model to the database.
        Parameters:
        model - spatial object must be changed (flag BaseModel.isChanged()), otherwise skipped

      • reloadSpatialObjects

        public void reloadSpatialObjects()
        Asynchronously reloads data and store as cached data in dataManager. Data are accessible through getSpatialObjects() method

      • getSpatialObjects

        public java.util.List<SpatialObjectModel> getSpatialObjects()
        Synchronouse method (available everywhere)
        Returns:
        cached spatial objects data from dataManager

      • getSpatialObjectTypes

        public java.util.List<SpatialObjectTypeModel> getSpatialObjectTypes()
        Synchronouse method (available everywhere)
        Returns:
        cached spatial objects data from dataManager

      • getEmployees

        public java.util.List<EmployeeModel> getEmployees()
        Synchronouse method (available everywhere)
        Returns:
        cached employees data from dataManager

      • showDialog

        protected void showDialog(int type,
                          java.lang.String message)
        Displays dialog with given message in the middle of the given JPanel, based on type.
        Parameters:
        type - type of the dialog (INFO_MESSAGE, WARNING_MESSAGE, ERROR_MESSAGE)
        message - message with description of the error

      • setRootPanel

        protected void setRootPanel(javax.swing.JPanel rootPanel)
        Sets root panel for showing error dialog.
        Parameters:
        rootPanel - root JPanel
